data.id: Code for Philly/School District of Philadelphia Budget - Data Liberation and Visualization

links.self: /organizations/Code for Philly/projects/School District of Philadelphia Budget - Data Liberation and Visualization.json

attributes.description: The School District of Philadelphia posts budgets for their schools on their [website](https://apps.philasd.org/SchoolBudgets/servlet). However, this data is in PDF format and therefore cannot be easily used by developers and others interested in examining the budgets of schools in a programmatic fashion.
attributes.name: School District of Philadelphia Budget - Data Liberation and Visualization
